General.Name: VLS Finance Limited
General.Description: VLS Finance Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of stock broking services in India. It also provides proprietary investments and equity research, as well as corporate consulting and advisory services. In addition, the company offers investment banking services, such as determination of the issue size and pricing; drafting of the offer document and filling the same with the authorities for approval; co-ordination with various regulatory authorities and private agencies during the issue; chalking out a successful strategy for marketing of the issue; and selection of the right market timing. VLS Finance Limited was incorporated in 1986 and is based in New Delhi, India.
General.Address: 90, Okhla Industrial Estate, New Delhi, India, 110020
